short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eliminate confusion, retain users, and increase product adoption with easy-to-build product walkthroughs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The SimpleTour Builder Extension allows you to build product walkthroughs directly on top of your own website with no code required. Simply create steps, select parts of the page to focus, edit the content to your liking, and publish your tour!

Other features include:
- Create and manage as many tours as you want, all in one convenient place
- Create modal or highlight steps and edit the content directly while seeing live previews as you go
- Use the Element Selector to easily select elements on your website that you want to highlight in the tour
- Delete, rearrange, or edit existing steps with ease
- Adjust the tour settings to use your own brand colors
